column3: Investigation Stage - case pending investigation from previous year (3)
column4: Investigation Stage - cases reported during the year (4)
column5: Investigation Stage - cases not investigatted or in which investigation was refused (5)
column6: Investigation Stage - cases declared false on account of mistake of fact or law (6)
column7: Investigation Stage - cases in which chargesheets were submitted (7)
column8: Investigation Stage - cases in which chargesheets were not submitted final report submitted during the year (8)
column10: Investigation Stage - cases pending investigation at the end of the year (10)
column11: Trial Stage - cases pending trial from previous year (11)
column12: Trial Stage - cases sent for trial during the year (12)
column13: Trial Stage - total cases for trial during the year (13)
column14: Trial Stage - cases in which trials were compounded or withdrawn (14)
column15: Trial Stage - cases in which trials were completed (15)
column17: Trial Stage - cases acquitted or discharged (17)
column18: Trial Stage - cases pending trial at the end of the year (18)
